content.p: Take a 3D Tour of the Carbon Neutral Laboratory A commitment to sustainability is at the core of our research activites. Our GlaxoSmithKline Carbon Neutral Laboratory is a remarkable building, constructed from the ground up with sustainability in mind enabling it to become carbon neutral over its lifetime. Take a tour of this state-of-the-art facility and meet some of the scientists carrying out world-leading research in Nottingham. The School of Chemistry embraces sustainability in all of our activities including research, teaching and learning, engagement and impact, and daily operations. Learn more about the 17 Sustainable Development Goals Follow us on Twitter Instagram Connect with us on Linked In The School of Chemistry is home to the Periodic Videos YouTube channel. Watch Periodic Videos For all enquiries please visit: www.nottingham.ac.uk/enquire
